messages.subject: Melanie - no longer in Japan (YES!!!!!!)
messages.msgSnippet: Hello! I just moved to Mississippi. I love it! I m at my parents house right now - I don t have a computer in my apartment yet. Anyway, I think somebody wrote
messages.messageBody:
Hello!

I just moved to Mississippi. I love it! I'm at my parents house
right now - I don't have a computer in my apartment yet. Anyway, I
think somebody wrote to me before, but, is there anybody who knows
any homeschoolers in Meridian, MS? Everybody is so into day care and
sending kids off to school early, etc., here.

Anyway, I'm so happy to be back in the States. DH is still in Japan
looking for a job here.

So anyway, I'm back!

Melanie in Japan
